author: Source: San Jose Mercury News
title: Milpitas slaying suspect appears in court on murder, battery charges - San Jose Mercury News
text:
San Jose resident Kevin Van Nguyen, 26, who was arrested Oct. 6 on suspicion of stabbing his ex-girlfriend Milpitas resident Danica Bascos appeared in court today. His defense attorney said they were engaging in the discovery process and both the defense and prosecution requested a Nov. 13 date.
 San Jose Mercury News.
